Sometimes when I read this kinda doujin, I thought, "Hold urself together. Its all just a human fantasy on paper." But my heart always said, "Everything you just saw, came from the deepest part of every human. You didn't even know if this might actually happen already, somewhere. And that person trying so hard to free from this hell circle."

Honestly while I hate this story, I gotta thank it for giving me the idea to write my story “My Neighbor in Black” granted it’s not the same ntr timeline it did help get an idea of what happened after someone is ntr’d. So thank your Benimaru Karu
